item.title: Exercises
item.description: Question and Answers: How do you assign a bash variable? Click Here for Answer bash_variable=variable-name How do you call a bash variable? Click Here for Answer $bash_variable_name What is a shebang? Click Here for Answer A shebang is a line that informs the operating system of the exact shell to use when executing the script.
